titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the President should appoint a Commission to study the Federal budget process.

action.text: Referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, requiring that if one Committee reports, the other Committee has thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Spending, Budget, Account.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should appoint a commission to study and report to the President on reforming the Federal budget process.
